supplier.description: Name of the supplier this campaign is for.

industry.description: Industry or sector focus for the campaign.

persona.description: Primary buyer persona targeted by this campaign.

executive_summary.description: Final consultant-grade executive summary narrative with inline [CLAIM_ID] tags and a citations array.

title.description: Headline title for the executive summary.

paragraphs.description: Ordered paragraphs forming the full executive summary narrative (typically 5â€“6: environment, case for action, how we win, success, next steps).

items.description: Paragraph text with inline [CLAIM_ID] tags where appropriate.

citations.description: List of all claim_ids referenced in the executive summary paragraphs.

value_proposition.description: Narrative value proposition derived from strategy_v2.value_proposition.

narrative.description: Multi-paragraph value proposition narrative with inline [CLAIM_ID] tags as needed.

competitive_position.description: Summary of how the supplier is positioned competitively, in buyer language.

proof_points.description: Key proof points, ideally with inline [CLAIM_ID] tags.

citations.description: All claim_ids referenced in the value proposition narrative and proof points.

messaging_matrix.description: High-level messaging matrix derived from strategy and buyer logic.

support_points.description: Supporting points under each pillar (may be written as a flat list, grouped in narrative form).

citations.description: All claim_ids referenced in the messaging matrix.

sales_enablement.description: Sales enablement content derived from strategy and buyer logic.

campaign_overview.description: Short narrative overview describing what the campaign is about and why it matters.

buyer_outcomes.description: List of outcomes the buyer can expect if they act.

discovery_questions.description: Discovery questions for sales, ideally written with an implicit rationale behind each.

competitive_battlecard.description: Structured notes for handling competitors in conversation.

master_pitch.description: A single, cohesive pitch sales can deliver, in natural language.

citations.description: All claim_ids referenced in the sales enablement content.

go_to_market_plan.description: Go-to-market plan derived from gtm_strategy and cohort data.

objective.description: Clear, commercial objective for the campaign.

target_market.description: Description of the target market and cohorts.

marketing_actions.description: Prioritised marketing actions (what marketing will do).

sales_actions.description: Prioritised sales actions (what sales will do).

pipeline_model.description: Summary of the pipeline model (tiers, motions, assumptions).

cta.description: The recommended call to action the supplier should take next with this cohort.

citations.description: All claim_ids referenced in the GTM plan.

risks_and_contingencies.description: Key risks and mitigation strategies for this campaign.

mitigations.description: Mitigation strategies corresponding to, or complementing, the risks.

compliance_and_governance.description: Notes on compliance, governance and constraints relevant to this campaign.

notes.description: Narrative description of compliance and governance considerations.

citations.description: All claim_ids referenced in this section.

one_pager_summary.description: Concise one-pager summary of the campaign.

positioning.description: Short statement of how the supplier is positioned in this campaign.

core_message.description: Single core message capturing the essence of the campaign.

quick_facts.description: Bullet list of quick facts or soundbites.
